title: Video: Pushing Hands – Frames
body: It’s been almost six months since **Pushing Hands** appeared on the pages of _CitR_ with their stirring video for debut track [_He’s Still Here_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8068-video-pushing-hands-hes-still-here/). New video _Frames_ is a slightly less introvert affair, following an ever changing train journey, passing through city centres and broad expenses of countryside. The track is the closest the UK have come this year to producing anything as startlingly honest as Youth Lagoon; softly spoken indie, grounded with folk influences all tied up by raw production methods. With more new material expected soon from **Pushing Hands**, as well as _Frames_ soon being made available for free download, I’ll be the first to say that it’s good to have them back.
